title: How to Pay As a Guest on PayPal on Android

steps.title: If you don't have a PayPal account but need to pay someone via PayPal, you can have them send you an invoice through PayPal's website.
steps.content: If you don't have a PayPal account but need to pay someone via PayPal, you can have them send you an invoice through PayPal's website. See How to Send a PayPal Invoice on Android for instructions on sending an invoice. [1] X Research source If you just want to pay for an item on a website that accepts PayPal, all you'll have to do is select the PayPal payment option, and then follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information.

steps.title: When you receive an invoice from PayPal, tap it in your inbox.
steps.content: When you receive an invoice from PayPal, tap it in your inbox. You’ll find this email invoice in the email account you gave the business or person. From a website, you can continue your purchase without an account by entering your card information in the "Pay without a PayPal account" header.

steps.title: Tap Pay Now or View and Pay Invoice.
steps.content: Tap Pay Now or View and Pay Invoice . The exact language may vary, but it is generally in the bottom of the email. If you don’t see that button embedded in the email, there is a link in that email you can follow as well.

steps.title: Tap Pay with debit or credit card instead of entering login information.
steps.content: Tap Pay with debit or credit card instead of entering login information. This is the option that lets you make a payment without having an account.

steps.title: Type your billing information into the form.
steps.content: Type your billing information into the form. This includes information such as your card number and expiration date, as well as your name, email, and address. Credit and debit card payments usually have a fee. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Review and Continue.
steps.content: Tap Review and Continue . It's at the bottom of the form. This submits your payment without requiring an account.
